comment: A mother decides to take her child on a piggyback ride outside their apartment complex .
A man wearing a bib with a red crab on it is trying to decide if he wants to eat a boiled crab .
Two kids wakeboarding simultaneously decide to signal for a high-five .
After playing with her other toys , the baby decides that the guitar seems fun to play with as well .
Many people have decided to take a rest on the steps .
Two men decide what to do with an obstructing fallen branch .
A group of dressed up people looking at a brochure trying to decide what site to see next .
The lady is waiting for her hair to dry after she decided to received hair treatment from her favorite salon .
A young woman apparently dressed for the evening has decided to ride a bike to the event , even while wearing high heels .
A man in a blue outfit decides to grab his private areas in the middle of a protest .
The lady in the red jacket is helping the other lady decide what to buy .
Cool guy decides to do a back flip in a park .
Before a couple orders their food in a restaurant , they decide to clown around for the other couple sitting with them .
Many people decide it 's time to eat .
A bike rider decides to take a relaxing ride down a busy road .
A woman decides which tasty snack to buy from a vending machine .
A close play is about to be decided by the umpire .
Two young women in front of a vending machine trying to decide what to get .
A female in a black shirt decided to take a picture of an attraction .
A woman decides to walk across the grass instead of using the sidewalk to get to her destination .
A hungry looking woman is trying to decide what to get from the deli .
An old man is trying to decide what type of fruit to buy today .
Male in a blue jacket decides to lay in the grass .
A family of three vacationing in the states , decided to go to a market .
A lady shopping in a shoe store trying to decide which pair or pairs of shoes to buy .
A group at a restaurant decide what they want to eat from their menus .
A woman looking at food trying to decide what she wants to buy .
Two men working at a Donut Shop promote their new product candied apples as Customers decide what is the healthiest option .
During the middle of a water fight a boy decides to dumb a gallon of water on a girl 's face .
A baby decides to pack himself away in a suitcase .
A window artist stops for a quick break as she decides on her next set of strokes .
A man in blue swim trunks decided to go swimming in ice cold water .
The umpire is judging a baseball move to decide if there was a score or an out .
The men decided it would be a nice day to take the boat out for a ride and pose together because they do n't see each other often .
